description: This file defines a Flutter widget, RecipeCard, which displays a brief overview of a recipe including image, title, description, rating, and favorite status. It handles user interactions like tapping to navigate to recipe details and toggling favorites.

classes.name: RecipeCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that presents a brief overview of a recipe with imagery, title, description, rating, and favorite toggle button, and navigates to detailed view on tap.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI of the RecipeCard widget including image, text details, and favorite button.
